Class Computer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
      • Computer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    class Computer
extends Player
implements java.io.Serializable
    Computer class is used to make a simple AI opponent for single- player mode.
    Author:
    Meet Arora

    • Method Detail

      • isBurstable

        private boolean isBurstable(Ball[][] matrix,
                            int i,
                            int j,
                            Grid grid)
        Checks if the ball at the given row index and column index is burst-ready or not.
        Parameters:
        matrix - is the grid of balls for the game
        i - is the row index
        j - is the column index
        grid - is the Grid object of the game page
        Returns:
        true if the ball is burstable and false if not

      • takeTurn

        void takeTurn(Ball[][] matrix,
              int n,
              int m)
        A function that automates a move for the Computer based on probability using randomisation. The probability are as follows: 55% probability to burst some ball 30% probability to select some existing ball 10% probability to select any of the valid points
        Overrides:
        takeTurn in class Player
        Parameters:
        matrix - is the grid of balls for the game
        n - is the number of rows
        m - is the number of columns
